long_description: Enjoy the wilderness view in your airy home away from home. The 3-season Mountain Hardwear Optic 3.5 Tent has a spacious layout with comfort and elbow room to spare for 3 backpackers. Unzip the 2 adjacent doors for a 180deg open-air view when the weather cooperates, or wait out the storm with plenty of room for people and gear. Dual vestibule design creates a dry entry into tent and room for gear storage. DAC Pressfit(R) poles feature a securely fixed, pressed-in ferrule, helping ensure the poles remain strong and reliable. Reflective, color-coded starter tab on the rainfly and canopy makes pitching easy. The Mountain Hardwear Optic 3.5 Tent features internal pockets that help keep small items organized and easy to locate.
short_description: Enjoy the wilderness view in your airy home away from home. The 3-season Mountain Hardwear Optic 3.5 Tent has a spacious layout with comfort and elbow room to spare for 3 backpackers.
